name: @morrisallison/typescript-boilerplate
author: Morris Allison III <author@morris.xyz> (http://morris.xyz)
description: An opinionated, fully featured boilerplate for TypeScript packages.

scripts.build: yarn run compile:dts && yarn run build:es5 && yarn run build:es6
scripts.build:es5: yarn run compile:es5 && yarn run bundle:es5
scripts.build:es6: yarn run compile:es6 && yarn run bundle:es6
scripts.bundle: yarn run bundle:es5 && yarn run bundle:es6
scripts.compile: yarn run compile:dts && yarn run compile:es5 && yarn run compile:es6
scripts.cover: nyc --reporter lcov --reporter text --reporter html --extension .ts --extension .tsx yarn test
scripts.gamut: yarn run clean && yarn run build && yarn run cover && yarn run lint
